text: @TMobile @Tesla Assuming all of the Covid-19 regulations are lifted(safety first i care for you people) Id take the @Tesla to California to meet @DavidDobrik , then to Colorado to show my mom and tell her I met David Dobrik, and then I'd take it to the Grand Canyon.  #tmobiletuesdays #contest
